message.content:
cs.DC, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.DS, cs.LG. 

The paper proposes a serverless computing mechanism for distributed computation based on polar codes, which involves coding theory and information theory. Therefore, cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) and cs.IT (Information Theory) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also addresses reliability issues and optimization problems, which could fall under cs.SY (Systems and Control) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). Finally, the paper presents experimental results and introduces a new idea, which could be related to cs.LG (Machine Learning).
